thread.title: Pregnant Side Chick Texts the Wrong Person and Things Take a Hilarious Turn
thread.title_full: Pregnant Side Chick Texts the Wrong Person and Things Take a Hilarious Turn

author: Abby Heugel
title: Pregnant Side Chick Texts the Wrong Person and Things Take a Hilarious Turn
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 389 Shares 
Buckle up, ladies and gentlemen, because this is quite the ride. 
An Imgur gallery posted by someone going by the username " OddOod " shows the back and forth between a pregnant woman and another person who the aforementioned pregnant woman thinks is her baby daddy's girlfriend, but who actually is not. That's all we have to go on, but the story pretty much tells itself. via: Imgur 
To be clear, the pregnant woman texts, “I just thought id [sic] should tell you. Youre [sic] boyfriend made me pregnant.” 
The recipient, who has no idea who this woman is, texts back “Oh no! Which boyfriend?” 
The pregnant woman (PW) is having none of that crap and is pissed at Sam while the recipient sees an opportunity for a little fun. So the recipient starts texting back pictures of various famous Sams, like Sam from Lord of the Rings and Sam from Game of Thrones. via: Imgur PW assumes the reason "Sam's girlfriend" isn't taking the situation seriously is that Sam is a bad dater, and his girlfriend is "crazy" to stay with him.
